Crab Strategy:

The Crab Strategy contract handles deposits & withdrawals, and automatically modifies its mixture of Squeeth debt & ETH collateral to create a position with an approximate delta of 0 to the price of ETH (neutral exposure to ETH)

Read more: https://t.co/Fy7UZJnHHy

Long Squeeth: 

â€¢ Leveraged position with unlimited upside, protected downside, and no liquidations
â€¢ Exposure to pure convexity (ETHÂ² payoff), giving it a more favorable payoff than 2x leverage
â€¢ Constant gamma exposure
â€¢ Holders pay a premium funding rate for this position https://t.co/WFJV2UIm0h
